questions.question: What is the difference between reds and silvers? {Two answers}

choices.answer: Reds are poor servants while slivers rule the country.
Only reds can own chichens
Reds are rich and silvers are poor.
Reds have red blood, and silvers have silver blood.

questions.question: What is Mare's motivation to run away with Kilorn?

choices.answer: They are starving and try to get food.
Kilorn's trainer dies so he will have to go to war like Mare
They hate life in the Silts.
Mare's chicken escapes.

questions.question: What causes Mare to become a servant at the palace?

choices.answer: She begs the king and queen for a job.
She meets Cal in secret and he gets her a job.
She wins a race and becomes famous.
She is still looking for her chicken.

questions.question: How does Mare discover her powers?

choices.answer: Evangeline uses her powers and Mare tries to defend herself.
Mare tried to get her chicken back.
Mare is trying to save Kilorn.
Mare is entered into the Hunger Games.

questions.question: What does Cal do to help Mare? {Two answers}

choices.answer: He saves her life many times.
He saves her chickens life.
He doesn't.
He gets her a job at the palace.

questions.question: Whats does Maven do to help Mare? {Two answers}

choices.answer: He can't stand the Scarlet Guard.
He finds Mare's chicken.
He claims to be part of the Scarlet Guard.
He helps Kilorn, Farley, and others escape from jail.

questions.question: How did Elara take advantage of her powers, and abuse Cal?

choices.answer: She makes Cal kill his dad and get jailed so, Maven is king.
She makes Cal kill Mare's chicken.
She makes Cal not want to be king so Maven can.
She makes Cal go to jail.

questions.question: How does Maven betray Mare and the Scarlet Guard? {Two Answers}

choices.answer: He kills Mare's chicken.
He makes Mare go to jail, when he becomes king.
He uses the info that the Guard told him against them.
He kills all the reds in Norta.

questions.question: How does the first person view affect the story?

choices.answer: It allows the perspective of Mare's struggles in life.
It allows you to know the chickens love life.
It allows you to know the difference between reds and silver
It allows you to know Cal's true feelings.

questions.question: How does the scene when Mare discovers her powers affect the story?  {Two answers}

choices.answer: It allows for Mare to save her chicken.
Mare is able to save Kilorn and her family from consumption.
She can buy an endless amount of cheese.
She is able to make money and save her family.

questions.question: How does Mare joining the Scarlet Guard affect the story? {Two answers}

choices.answer: It allows the guard to get important info.
It allow the guard to save Mare's chicken.
Mare is able to stand up for a cause she believes for.
The guard gets a lifetime supply of bagpipes.

questions.question: How does Maven abandoning the Guard affect the story? {Two answers}

choices.answer: It causes Mare to be jailed.
It causes the bagpipes to explode.
Maven is crowned king and tries to end the rebellion.
The chicken is saved.

questions.question: How does Maven misuse his mothers power?

choices.answer: He learns to play the bagpipes.
He gets his own chicken.
He makes Cal and Mare get jailed so he can become king.
He makes himself marry someone who is not Mare.

questions.question: Why is Maven motivated to get Mare and Cal jailed?

choices.answer: So he can become king.
So he can get the most expensive pair of bagpipes.
So he can get a chicken.
So he can be next in line for king.
